name: Najmus Sakib Rashid
description: Najmus Sakib Rashid from Dinajpur, Bangladesh, is a skilled Web Developer, Software Engineer, and ML/DL Engineer. A BUET graduate, he excels in C++, Java, Python, and JavaScript, with strong OOP and DSA knowledge. Najmus enjoys reading newspapers, tourism, and engaging with friends. He has won first prizes in Sudoku and Physics Olympiads at DRMC Science Fest and solved over 500 programming problems. Najmus aims to lead with professionalism, resilience, and a vision to make a positive societal impact.
